com.devtence.will.dev.models.jazz

Class Content

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.models.BaseModel<Content>
      • com.devtence.will.dev.models.jazz.Content

  • public class Content
extends BaseModel<Content>
    Class that models the Content data and maps it's structure to the persistence layer, it also defines and implements the functions that can be performed with the Contents.

    This class is the central component for the Content Management System defined by the Jazz Classes.

    Since:
    2015-06-09
    Author:
    sorcerer
    See Also:
    Author, Category, Label, JazzFile, Language
